comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Brilliant ... I love the details of which ferry Frederic Garner Wilkinson caught.   Has the ANMM got his diary or something?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hi Beachcomber - when the images were donated by his family they were very well catalogued & came with notes on dates, ships and places etc. Wilkinson was probably so meticulous in recording these details as he sold many of his photographs for reproduction as souvenir postcards. Either way it was very considerate of him for future curators and archivists!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
